description: This file is the main entry point for a Flutter application called 'Galactic Tic-Tac-Toe'. It defines the root widget 'TicTacToeApp' that sets up the app with theming, routing, and state management via Provider. It imports several local screen components and a theme, indicating its role in initializing and configuring the larger app.

classes.name: TicTacToeApp
classes.description: A stateless widget that serves as the root of the Flutter app, configuring theme, routes, and state management.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The application's entry point that runs the Flutter app by instantiating 'TicTacToeApp'.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for 'TicTacToeApp', setting up provider, theme, and routing.
